room_title: Escape room "The Heist" by Masterminds Escape Room and Game Library in Mansfield
review: We completed the Heist!!! What a blast! Very happy to have this in Ashland! If you haven't been there, get a group of friends, book a room, and have a great time!

room_title: Escape room "The Heist" by Masterminds Escape Room and Game Library in Mansfield
review: One of the best I have tried - we did The Heist and it was extremely entertaining! I also love that they have a lobby area with tables that you can just go and play board games if you choose.

room_title: Escape room "The Heist" by Masterminds Escape Room and Game Library in Mansfield
review: Visited recently with three other friends and participated in "The Heist." Despite not completing our mission, we had a fantastic time and are looking forward to returning soon!
